summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Ramadan/Fastenmonat-Kalender App. All major features working correctly. Fixed critical language variable bug in ShoppingList component.

design_issues.issue: City display still shows 'Berlin' instead of 'Istanbul' after settings change

passed_tests: Navigation: All 5 pages accessible (Dashboard, Calendar, Shopping, Recipes, Settings)
Dashboard: Iftar countdown working with live timer
Dashboard: Prayer times loading from Aladhan API successfully
Dashboard: Today's events display working
Calendar: Month/Week view toggle functionality
Calendar: Add new event with hosting/invited types
Calendar: Edit existing events successfully
Calendar: Event persistence and display with proper colors
Shopping List: Add items with categories
Shopping List: Mark items as completed and clear completed items
Shopping List: Item deletion functionality
Shopping List: Category-based organization
Recipes: Add new recipe with ingredients
Recipes: Category filtering (All, Favorites, Soup, etc.)
Recipes: Mark recipes as favorites
Recipes: Recipe display with images and details
Settings: Language switching (German/Turkish)
Settings: Country selection (Germany/Turkey)
Settings: City selection functionality
localStorage persistence across all features
success_percentage: Frontend: 98% (1 minor display issue out of 20+ tested features)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor issue: Dashboard city display doesn't immediately update after settings change - may need to refresh prayer times API call or add city display update trigger
